DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomized study of patients admitted to the Pediatric Intensive Care Unit suffering from Bronchiolitis and are supported on Non Invasive Positive Pressure Ventilation. The patient population will be divided into two groups, one group will receive conventional treatment and the other group will receive conventional treatment and three times a day of physiotherapy using Intrapulmonary Percussive Ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Intrapulmonary Percussive Ventilation for Children With Bronchiolitis on Non-Invasive Ventilation Support
DOC.criteria: Bronchiolitis PICU patients Non Invasive Pressure Support Ventilation Age < 24 months Age > 24 months Invasive Ventilation No parental consent
